context_bundle.summary: VSCode extension development: yo generator-code scaffolds extensions. package.json defines activationEvents, contributes (commands, views). Extension API: vscode.commands, vscode.window, vscode.workspace. TypeScript or JavaScript. F5 to debug in Extension Development Host.

onboarding.quick_start: VSCode extensions: npm install -g yo generator-code, run yo code, choose extension type. package.json: activationEvents (when to load), contributes (commands/views). Main file exports activate() function. Debug with F5. Official API: https://code.visualstudio.com/api
common_patterns: F5 to debug in Extension Development Host
